favourite.article: Amen He that believeth on the son of God has everlasting life. I am totally blessed.

I love this hymn very much and sing it most of my life, but it just came to my mind today that there is so much more to salvation than believing i.e. James 2:19b " ...the devils also believe, and tremble." May the Lord give us grace to wait faithfully on and for Him.
How blessed to be a child of God through the shed blood of His Son--Jesus Christ. Thank You Father for making all Christ's followers special.
